name: Tremors: Escape from El Blanco (TogetherJam2022)
description:
Made in 50 hours for Together Jam 2022 https://gamejolt.com/c/togetherjam

Theme : Power in numbers

Graboids are at it again in Perfection, Nevada. It seems that, this time, El Blanco is out to get you! Put on your cowboy hat and go save all the townfolk. And don't forget : stay on the rocks!

Controls: 

  • arrow keys : move
  • enter : ok in menus

This game uses Lootlocker for leaderboards
